item.title: Thoughts on MLS, the WG, and the current draft
item.description: I recently sent an e-mail to the MLS working group with some comments on the draft. Because there appears to be little interest in improving the draft I want to use this post to elaborate on the issues I see with the draft an the working group. This is an opinion piece. MLS Let’s first recap on MLS. According to messaginglayersecurity.rocks the Messaging Layer Security (MLS) is a security layer for encrypting messages in groups of size two to many.
